titleStmt.title: SII 7.25: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 25. (A.R. No. 25 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrīḥ . koṟccaṭapaṉmarāṉa tribhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīcuntarapāṇṭiyatevarkku yāṇṭu 6vatu Āṟāvatu kaṟkaṭakanāyaṟṟu
pūrvvapakṣattu caturtthiyum tiṅkaṭkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Uttirattu nāḷ koṅkāṉa viracoḻamaṇṭalattu pūvāṇiyanāṭṭut tāramaṅkalattu mutalikaḷil niruṇi Iḷaiyāṉ nallaUṭaiyappaṉ taṅkaḷ pitākkaḷper vaitta Iḷaiyaperumāḷ ka śrīlakṣmaṇaccaturvvedimaṅkalattu bhaṭṭarkaḷukku Innāṭṭu nāṭṭavarom
viṟṟukkuṭutta Innāṭṭuk kārakkuḷam nāṉkellaik kuṭppaṭṭa puṉceyum nattamum cemappaḷḷieri Uḷḷiṭṭa Erikaḷāl nirpāyum nañcaiyum Ivvūrppaṟṟil nīrnilai maranilai Uḷḷiṭṭa samastaprāptikaḷum Uṭppaṭṭavaiyiṟṟil tevatānam tiruviṭaiyāṭṭam Uḷḷiṭṭa nilam niṅkalāka Ivvūr viṟṟukkuṭuttom śrī
lakṣmaṇaccaturvvedimaṅkalattu Akarappaṭṭarkaḷukku Innāṭṭu nāṭṭavarom Ippaṭi viṟṟukkuṭutta Ivvūrkku viṟṟukkuṭuttu
koḷvatāna Emmilicaintu vilaipporu ḷaṉṟāṭu naṟpaṇam 1000 5 100 Ippaṇam Āyirattaññūṟṟukkum vilaikkuṟa viṟṟup poru ḷuṟa
k kaikkoṇṭu Udakapūrvvamāka viṟṟu vilaipramāṇam paṇṇikkuṭuttom Ivvakarattu paṭṭarkaḷukku Innāṭṭu nāṭṭavarom
Ippaṭi viṟṟukkuṭutta Ivvūr Iṉṉāḷmutal Ivarkaḷ kaiykkoṇṭu tāṅkaḷ veṇṭum Aṉaittup payirum cey
Digital edition of SII 7.25 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
